data.title: UPRR Museum
data.meta_description: Located in historic downtown Council Bluffs, Iowa, we're a great place for friends and family to come and learn about the Union Pacific Railroad.
data.text:
Beginning May 26th, we expanding our regular hours to include Sundays, 12 to 6 p.m.!

Our Summer hours will continue through August 25th.

Thursday through Saturday, 10 a.m. to 6 p.m.

Sunday 12 p.m. to 6 p.m.

Mark your calendars for Augustâ€™s Club Car Conversation! This month, we are welcoming Dave Mrsny from the House of Trains on August 27th at 5:30pm on Zoom!

Dave will be chatting to us all about the history of model trains, starting a layout, choosing scale, scenery construction and more!

Club Car Conversations are casual chats about railroads, history and pop culture! They are free to join, just RSVP to receive the Zoom link!

Looking for some throwback recipes? Check out our new UP Commissary cook book! For more than a century, UP employees delivered high-quality meals and service to the public traveling on their iconic trains. This mid-20th century Dining Car Service Manual from the UP collection has been reproduced for you to enjoy!

Get a behind-the-scenes look into what it took to deliver world-class service in a moving restaurant. Recreate some of your favorites or try something new!

The Union Pacific Dining Car Cook Book and Service Instructions (replica edition) is available for purchase now!
